root.name: X-COM: Interceptor
root.description: OverviewIn X-COM: Interceptor, players pilot an X-Com Interceptor ship and battle the aliens. As X-COM's commander, players are tasked with protecting humanity and the prized mining operations in outer space. Players must strategically equip X-COM fighters, amass a formidable arsenal and then battle the aliens. PC System Requirements Supported OS: Microsoft® 2000/XP/Vista®Processor: Pentium 166MHz or betterMemory: 16Mb RAMGraphics: Must be capable of 16-bit graphics (High Color) and have a minimum of 2MB of video RAMHard Drive: 60 MB Hard Disk Space
